name: Pendlum & Sons - Prototype
description:
Follow Arthur Pendlum, a clock repairman and member of the Timekeepers Guild in an alternate, Steampunk Victorian London as he zips around clocktowers with the help of his trusty grappling hook.

---

Made during third year of college for an assignment

--

Resources Used:

  • 2 Minute Photoshop (2017), 'How to make wood texture in Photoshop', online video, available at: https://youtu.be/o_86ZvhiFD0 [Accessed 14/04/20]
  • Cabled Mess (2016), 'Typewriter snippet 02', Freesound.org, available at: https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/360602/ [Accessed 14/04/20]
  • Fungus Games (2020), 'Fungus', Unity Asset Store, available at: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/fungus-34184 [Accessed 16/04/20]
  • imagex (2019), 'Steam Punk Flyer Font', Dafont.com, available at: https://www.dafont.com/steam-punk-flyer.font [Accessed 16/04/20]
  • Kevin MacLeod (2016), 'Gaslamp Funworks', Incompetech.com, available at: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100826 [Accessed 15/04/20]
  • Trey VanZandt (YouTube.com/c/treyvanzandt) (2016),  'Sanderburry's Steamworks', available at: https://www.dropbox.com/s/hkac98jl0nmxnjk/Sanderburry%27s%20Steamshop.mp3?dl=0 [Accessed 15/04/20]
  • Wabble - Unity Tutorials (2015), 'Grappling Hook (Part 1) - Unity 2D Tutorial (C#)', online video, available at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHhzWlrTgJo [Accessed 04/04/20]
  • Wabble - Unity Tutorials (2015), 'Grappling Hook (Part 2) - Unity 2D Tutorial (C#)', online video, available at: https://youtu.be/DTFgQIs5iMY [Accessed 13/04/20]
